data.text: What a inspiring trip to #NYC last week! I had the opportunity to see @JimOnCities @rolandpersaud @VCerulloNYC @jlavin26 @RPierceCity . Thanks for all that you to to support global #cities everyday. #Thankful #cityhallselfie @CityHallSelfie @BloombergCities @publicinno https://t.co/mSreHlm7Tz
RT @DrZeemering: My Local Government Management class starts tonight. I’m glad I could start the spring semester w/ a #cityhallselfie w/ @B…
RT @localgovlaura: Couldn't resist a #cityhallselfie in the place where my local gov love blossomed! https://t.co/xQrzECvNwu

users.description: Exec Dir, Bloomberg Center for Public Innovation at Johns Hopkins | Fmr City of LA Chief Innovation Officer | Do-er | Creator | Democracy | Family | @publicinno
users.name: ⭐️Amanda Daflos⭐️

users.description: #CityHallSelfie is Friday, August 13 and is hosted by ELGL, the Engaging Local Government Leaders @ELGL50! Use #CityHallSelfie to add your pic to the fun!
users.name: ELGL #CityHallSelfie Day

tweets.text: My Local Government Management class starts tonight. I’m glad I could start the spring semester w/ a #cityhallselfie w/ @BaileyDickinson - a @UGA_PA_Policy MPA alumnus and assistant to the city mgr in Covington. Last May’s grads got some great local govt jobs! https://t.co/vf6kG65RYd
Couldn't resist a #cityhallselfie in the place where my local gov love blossomed! https://t.co/xQrzECvNwu
